name: Be Kind, Rewind (jdparker714)
description:
A fun rhythm game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

Play as the Grim Reaper trying to REWIND time in order to save the souls of the innocent.  In order to rewind time you will have to use your strongest weapon... DANCE!  

Use WASD/Arrows to move along to the beat and avoid attacks from Father-Time.  The longer you dance, the more souls you save!  There are 9 special souls that you can save at specific milestones, such as "Bronkeys the youtube creator"!

The theme of the Gamejam was "rewind," and I tried to take it in a unique direction.  I just wanted to avoid recreating one of the 100's of platformers with time mechanics.  I also wanted to experiment with making a rhythm game.  Enjoy!

(LMK in the comments if the build doesn't work and I'll repost one.  I wanted to do webgl, but it hated rhythm XD)
